section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
goals__remit: The Software & Information Industry Association (SIIA) represents over 700 firms in the technology sector, including Internet, software and content companies.  SIIA advocates for free trade with modern data flow provisions, harm-based data privacy rules, intellectual property protection, and multi-stakeholder Internet governance.
